target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: No findings were reported by the audit. The target vulnerability (ERC-777 reentrancy in withdraw function) was not identified.

notes: The audit incorrectly marked the contract as safe with 95% confidence. The contract contains a classic ERC-777 reentrancy vulnerability in the withdraw function (lines 53-75). The function transfers tokens via IERC777.transfer() on line 68 BEFORE updating the state balances on lines 71-72. This violates the Checks-Effects-Interactions pattern and allows ERC-777 tokens to reenter the contract through their tokensToSend hook, enabling recursive withdrawals that can drain the contract. The audit completely missed this critical vulnerability.
